mapper.select: SELECT op.no AS orderProductNo, op.order_no AS orderNo, op.product_no AS productNo, op.quantity, op.amount, op.size, p.no AS productNo, p.category_no AS categoryNo, p.picture_path AS picturePath, p.name AS productName, p.price AS price FROM order_product op JOIN product p ON op.product_no = p.no WHERE order_no=#{orderNo }
